text: Inho, jahudijon, cun ʙo mu'minon voxurand, ʙo zaʙonason gujand: «Mo ham ʙa dini sumo va rasule, ki dar Tavrot ʙasorat doda sudaast, imon ovardem». Ba cun ʙo jakdigar tanho savand, gujand: «Ojo ʙo mu'minon, az donise, ki Alloh ʙa sumo arzoni dosta (dar Tavrot az amri Muhammad) suxan megued, to ʙa jorii on ruzi qijomat dar nazdi Parvardigoraton ʙar sumo huccat orand? Ojo ʙa aql darnamejoʙed? Ja'ne andesa namekuned.»
